plot: There is trouble between the Dunbar brothers when Wally proposes to Bonnie on his brother's behalf only to have her accept him. Their feud is interupted when they have to go after a con man...
title: Flying Lariats
plot_es: There is trouble between the Dunbar brothers when Wally proposes to Bonnie on his brother's behalf only to have her accept him. Their feud is interupted when they have to go after a con man...
